title: Warp integrates AI with Warp AI (terminal chat)
why: Embed ChatGPT-based assistant directly into the terminal
impact: Slack‑like chat within terminal, AI‑powered command suggestions, error explanations, and execution
next: Expand terminal‑context awareness, port to more platforms, evolve into multi‑agent workflows

title: Anthropic releases Claude Code (research preview)
impact: First major LLM CLI tool with codebase understanding, editing, git integration
next: Expand usage, public release beyond research preview

title: OpenAI launches Codex CLI
why: Local, natural‑language terminal coding with approval modes
impact: Open‑source CLI agent enabling local AI‑powered coding workflows

title: Google unveils Gemini CLI
why: Open‑source AI agent with Gemini 2.5 Pro in terminals
impact: Largest token context (1 M tokens), integrated MCP, media generation support
next: Preview expansions, community growth, deeper IDE/terminal sync

title: Anthropic launches Claude 4 (Opus & Sonnet)
next: Watch IDE plugins & long‑run agent demos

title: Microsoft unveils NLWeb at Build 2025
why: Open protocol for on‑site natural‑language search
impact: Decentralises AI UX; every site can host its own chatbot
next: Early pilots on TripAdvisor, Shopify by June

title: Google announces Agent‑2‑Agent (A2A) protocol
next: Spec v1.0 due Q3; OSS SDKs incoming

title: Model Context Protocol v1.0 ships
why: Unified way to stream context & tools to LLMs
impact: Bridges editors, browsers, servers with AI
next: Integration into NLWeb endpoints by default
